"Chaotic Darkness":
"Non-Oceanid enemies have been
confirmed in the Floating Facility on
planet Wopal.
The number of Darkers there is
increasing, as is their level of activity.
We have also detected a Dark Falz-class
reading in the area.
All ARKS, dispatch and investigate.
―――――――――――――――――――
Collect [2000] Quest Points to clear."
"We have spotted enemies that should not even be in this area."
"We're also detecting movement from Darkers, as well as energy patterns matching multiple Dark Falz."
"Investigate the cause of this and watch your backs."
